channel.title: Foosball on Pandaqi Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in Foosball on Pandaqi Tutorials

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to the guide on how to improve at foosball. Maybe you’ve always wanted to be better than the average random person at this great game.

item.title: Rules & Fundamentals
item.description: You can’t play a game without knowing the general rules or structure. So let’s get that out of the way.

item.title: Ball Control
item.description: In any ball sport, I’ve learned that ball control is most important. Because what are you doing most of the time?

item.title: Passing
item.description: Great! You’re able to catch a ball and keep it in your possession. It’s time for you to do something useful with it—like scoring some goals.

item.title: Shooting
item.description: With shooting, it’s always a trade-off between accuracy and power. You can shoot a ball blazing fast, but then you lose control and won’t be able to aim it accurately.

item.title: Defending from the back
item.description: Defense doesn’t win matches, but it makes winning much more likely. If you take away all the possibilities for the opponent to score, well, you only need to score one goal to win!

item.title: Defending from the front
item.description: Your midfield has 5 men on it, your attacking zone has 3. A quick calculation shows that the majority of your men are in that part of the field.

item.title: Tips & Tricks
item.description: Congratulations! You have finished this guide. You know the rules, you know to control and pass the ball, and you know how to shoot and defend from all positions.
